data.eml:eml: Two new species of Halictophagidae (Insecta: Strepsiptera) including the first record of genus Coriophagus Kinzelbach from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roy, Sukhendu, Hazra, Niladri (2016): Two new species of Halictophagidae (Insecta: Strepsiptera) including the first record of genus Coriophagus Kinzelbach from India. Zootaxa 4189 (1): 581-587, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4189.3.8
